name: Easy Homemade Olive Oil Mayonnaise
author: Cheryl King
summary: Have you ever wanted to try homemade olive oil mayonnaise but were afraid it would be a hassle? This recipe uses an immersion blender, but don't worry if you don't have one--I've included instructions to make it without it in the note section of this recipe. You'll never want to buy regular mayonnaise again once you see how easy making it homemade really is!
directions: Pour eggs, olive oil, canola oil, lemon juice, white wine vinegar, dry mustard, and salt into a large mason jar
Place the blade of an immersion blender near the bottom of the jar and blend, starting at high speed until combined, about 20 seconds
Raise the blender using an up and down motion and mix until mayonnaise is emulsified, about 1 minute
Place a lid on the jar and refrigerate until use, for up to two weeks
